name: component

style.description: Specifies whether a CFC used for web services uses RPC-encoded style or document-literal style

output.description:
yes: permits component method output
				no: suppresses component method output

extends.description: Name of parent component from which to inherit methods and properties.

description: Creates and defines a component object; encloses functionality that you build in CFML and enclose within cffunction tags. This tag contains one or more cffunction tags that define methods. Code within the body of this tag, other than cffunction tags, is executed when the component is instantiated.
